elements.name: Verify that the user can add a product to the cart

steps.name: the user is on My account page and clicks on the Category dropdown
selects the "Hand Tools"
the user should be navigated to the relevant "Hand Tools" page
select the "Bolt Cutters" and "2" and clicks on Add to cart
The Product added to your shopping cart message "Product added to shopping cart." should be displayed

elements.name: Verify correct product and quantity in cart

steps.name: the user is on My account page and clicks on the Category dropdown
selects the "Hand Tools"
the user should be navigated to the relevant "Hand Tools" page
select the "Bolt Cutters" and "2" and clicks on Add to cart
the user clicks on cart icon
the cart should display the "Bolt Cutters" and "2" and "$48.41" and correct "$96.82"

elements.name: Update quantity of a product in the cart

steps.name: the user is on My account page and clicks on the Category dropdown
selects the "Other"
the user should be navigated to the relevant "Other" page
select the "Ear Protection" and "1" and clicks on Add to cart
the user clicks on cart icon
the cart should display the "Ear Protection" and "1" and "$18.58" and correct "$18.58"
the user increases or decrease the quantity of "Ear Protection" to "3"
the success message "Product quantity updated." should be displayed with "Ear Protection" and "3" and "$18.58" and correct "$55.74"

elements.name: Update quantity of a product in the cart

steps.name: the user is on My account page and clicks on the Category dropdown
selects the "Hand Tools"
the user should be navigated to the relevant "Hand Tools" page
select the "Bolt Cutters" and "4" and clicks on Add to cart
the user clicks on cart icon
the cart should display the "Bolt Cutters" and "4" and "$48.41" and correct "$193.64"
the user increases or decrease the quantity of "Bolt Cutters" to "2"
the success message "Product quantity updated." should be displayed with "Bolt Cutters" and "2" and "$48.41" and correct "$96.82"

elements.name: Remove an item from the cart

steps.name: the user is on My account page and clicks on the Category dropdown
selects the "Other"
the user should be navigated to the relevant "Other" page
select the "Ear Protection" and "1" and clicks on Add to cart
the user clicks on cart icon
the cart should display the "Ear Protection" and "1" and "$18.58" and correct "$18.58"
the user removes the product from the cart
the message "Product deleted." should be displayed

elements.name: User cannot proceed to checkout after removing all "<Product>"

steps.name: the user is on Home page and clicks on the Category dropdown
selects the "Hand Tools" category
the user should be navigated to the related "Hand Tools" page
select the "Adjustable Wrench" and "2" and clicks on Add to cart
the user clicks on Category dropdown
selects the "Power Tools" category
the user should be navigated to the related "Power Tools" page
select the "Cordless Drill 12V" and "1" and clicks on Add to cart
the user clicks on Category dropdown
selects the "Other" category
the user should be navigated to the related "Other" page
select the "Washers" and "4" and clicks on Add to cart
the user clicks on cart icon
the cart should display:
the cart also displays the "$101.36" cart total
the user removes all the product from the cart
the "Product deleted." message should be displayed after deleting each item
the Proceed to checkout button should be not visible

name: Cart Page Functionality
description:
As a user I want to manage my shopping cart
  So that I can review, modify or remove items before purchase

elements.name: User completes a purchase from product selection to order confirmation

steps.name: the user is logged in with email "priya@gmail.com" and password "WVhft76@99"
the user is on My account page and clicks on the Category dropdown
selects the "Other" category
the user should be navigated to the related "Other" page
select the "Protective Gloves" and "4" and clicks on Add to cart
the user clicks on cart icon
the cart should display the "Protective Gloves" and "4" and "$21.42" and correct "$85.68"
user clicks on first Proceed to checkout button
the user sees the message "you are already logged in. You can proceed to checkout."

arguments.val: "you are already logged in. You can proceed to checkout."

steps.name: user clicks on second Proceed to checkout button
the Billing Address should be displayed
user clicks on third Proceed to checkout button
the user chooses "Credit Card" payment method with ""and clicks on Confirm button
the user should see "Payment was successful" message and clicks on Confirm button again
the user should see "Thanks for your order! Your invoice number is" order confirmation message

arguments.val: "Thanks for your order! Your invoice number is"

elements.name: Guest user selects multiple products from different categories and completes a purchase

the user should be navigated to the related "Hand Tools" page

the user clicks on Category dropdown
selects the "Power Tools" category
the user should be navigated to the related "Power Tools" page
select the "Cordless Drill 12V" and "1" and clicks on Add to cart
the user clicks on Category dropdown
selects the "Other" category
the user should be navigated to the related "Other" page
select the "Washers" and "4" and clicks on Add to cart
the user clicks on cart icon
the cart should display:
the cart also displays the "$101.36" cart total
user clicks on first Proceed to checkout button
the log in page should be displayed and the user enters valid "priya@gmail.com" and "WVhft76@99" and clicks on login button
the user sees the message "you are already logged in. You can proceed to checkout."

arguments.val: "you are already logged in. You can proceed to checkout."

steps.name: user clicks on second Proceed to checkout button
the Billing Address should be displayed
user clicks on third Proceed to checkout button
the user chooses "Gift Card" payment method with ""and clicks on Confirm button
the user should see "Payment was successful" message and clicks on Confirm button again
the user should see "Thanks for your order! Your invoice number is" order confirmation message

arguments.val: "Thanks for your order! Your invoice number is"
